name: Linguistix
tag_list: translation-services, translation-company, localization, translation-agency, interpreting, website-translation
overview: Linguistix provides language translation services to companies, public sector organizations and translation agencies who wish to communicate across language barriers. Linguistix translates to more than 100 languages. With a network of over 2000 translators around the world the company is able to translate small to large translation projects. It uses proprietary technology and the global location of its employees to operate 24 hours per working day.
